General.Name: Cogra 48 Société Anonyme
General.Description: Cogra 48 Société Anonyme produces and sells wood pellets and stoves. It also provides consulting, project planning, and assistance services in project management; and technical advice, boiler room layout, stoves, project design and dimensioning, power and distribution study, silo design study, and guaranteed supply services. The company distributes its pellets through a network of retailers in France and other European countries. Cogra 48 Société Anonyme was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Mende, France.
